__e: Do you know the only reason that you have this job Is because I was being nice to your sister?
Seems to me one of the wisest things he ever told us was this...
See, you're the liaison for Peregrine, but you didn't know they were using that weapon until I told you, is that right?
How were you to know that I was going to come along?
Or they say, "Before me you didn't know what sex was."
I thought you didn't know what I said about you.
And in my hour of darkness She is standing right in front of me Speaking words of wisdom, let it be.
Only this, a man who does not expect a surprise attack in the middle of hearing wisdom is like a worm who...
You know, when I'm down and you give me these words of wisdom and you say to me, "Honey, you don't need to see a shrink.
Yeah, but you knew about that, didn't you?
None of the guests had any idea it was there.
What did you know about girls before your brother's excellent advice?
So just to see, of the four of you, if it had been Jenna instead, would anybody have changed their vote? Who would have still voted...? You would have changed your vote.
Oh, I'm the lucky one. Don't you know that?
You knew this, and yet you still gave this woman your powers.
